title: Nueva Campeona

embed.description: This is my fan character for League i've been working for a month, i'm pretty happy with her so far! wanted to bring some more attention to the watchers with my champion, i hope you guys like her as i do!

replies.body: Otra vez esto? Dejen de spamearlo ya
